rows.label: tev079391_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmm... Who could those kind and gallant fellows
possibly have been? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0002
rows.name:
Ah, it's you, [ST:playername ]! *fsssh*
Perhaps you could help me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0003
rows.name:
I am trying to figure out the identity of the Prone group
that saved my life. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0004
rows.name:
You see, until just recently, I was prospecting for
voltant outside of the city. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0005
rows.name:
Unfortunately, I was spotted by a band of Milsaadi
who quickly surrounded my trailer. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0006
rows.name:
But then a squad of pink-colored Prone appeared from
out of nowhere and thoroughly pummeled my Milsaadi
assailants! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0007
rows.name:
If it hadn't been for them, I'd never have made it back
to New LA alive. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0008
rows.name:
But Prone of that color are still supposed to be loyal to
the Ganglion. *fsssh* Why would they rescue me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Horonalderon that he should ask the Prone chieftain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_JNK0020
rows.name: Speculate[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_SEL0021
rows.name:
Tell Horonalderon that he was
likely rescued by Team Slovity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0009
rows.name:
Their chieftain is Sevvy Belgazus, I believe? *fsssh*
Well, I suppose that makes sense.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0010
rows.name:
Anyway, they ran off as quickly as they had appeared.
I didn't even have a chance to thank them. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's possible that I simply didn't perceive their color
correctly. Perhaps due to the sunset? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0012
rows.name:
But thank you. I will bring a token of appreciation to
Sevvy Belgazus and ask for his council. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0013
rows.name:
Perhaps that will lead to stronger ties and deeper
friendship between the Prone and Zaruboggan. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0014
rows.name:
What?! There's a group of pink Prone that have
deserted from the Ganglion? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0015
rows.name:
...And you say that they're now in New LA fighting
against the Ganglion? *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0016
rows.name:
Thank you so much! I will go speak with them and
bring a token of my gratitude. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0017
rows.name:
The way those women fought was nothing short of
spectacular. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev079391_MSG0018
rows.name:
I am eager to hear of the great deeds this Slovity has
achieved from her own lips! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]
